duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct Classroom Assessment Scoring System (CLASS) observations in Infant, Toddler, and Pre-Kindergarten classrooms.
Keep CLASS certification current and complete ongoing calibration as directed.
Participate in project-specific training and mandatory project check-in meetings.
Complete data entry and post-observation work in a timely manner.
Interact with school administration, office staff, and teachers in a professional and courteous manner.

education_certification.credential: B.A. degree in relevant field, Child development or Education preferred
